name: Shoot Numbers
description:
Shoot your way through the numbers! 

Game Description

Player control super power cube and can move to the left or to the right side. Try to shoot through the lines of obstacles and ugly numbers. Every destroyed obstacle adds score to player. Obstacles duration increases by time! Player also can pick up a upgrade for increase a fire rate. When you hit a number then it is game over!

3D game developed with Unreal Engine 5.1. I'd like to try create a little game in couple days to get familiar with a new Unreal Engine version and also create a small example that can help someone

Game Features
  • Obstacle generate
  • Increasing difficulty (every couple seconds numbers grow up)
  • Shooting and auto fire
  • Simple upgrade system (increase your fire rate)
  • Save system (High score is saved and loaded)
